item.description: Backup Your System Ubuntu Help Arch Wiki Rsync 备份 #!/bin/bash set -o errexit set -o nounset set -o pipefail readonly SOURCE_DIR=/ readonly BACKUP_DIR="$(findmnt -nr -o target -S /dev/mapper/luks-5277e33d-604f-4c1e-bc8c-40c14544614e)/Ubuntu2204" readonly DATETIME="$(date '+%Y-%m-%d_%H:%M:%S')" readonly BACKUP_PATH="${BACKUP_DIR}/${DATETIME}" readonly LATEST_LINK="${BACKUP_DIR}/latest" rsync -av \ --delete "${SOURCE_DIR}/" \ --link-dest "${LATEST_LINK}" \ --exclude={"dev/*","proc/*","sys/*","tmp/*","run/*","mnt/*","media/*","lost+found/*","Trash/*","DataBackup/*","DataPool/*","swapfile","cxoffice",".cxoffice","*.iso","*.qcow2",".steam","Downloads/*","*.exe","Ventoy","Desktop/*","Music/*",".snapshots","Games","Pictures/*","Videos/*",".cache"} \ "${BACKUP_PATH}" rm -rf "${LATEST_LINK}" ln -s "${BACKUP_PATH}" "${LATEST_LINK}" 注意： ${SOURCE_DIR
